meanings.definition: The presence of multiple languages or dialects within a single speech community.
meanings.sent1: In our neighborhood, the heteroglossias can be heard through various languages spoken by our diverse neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The heteroglossias in the city make it a vibrant and culturally rich place to live.
